title: Pitbull's Fireball and Kevin Smith's walrus horror â it's today's pop culture live | Culture | The Guardian
summary: sophie 's lemonade is the most bonkers track we 've heard all year .
kevin smith 's new movie is all your nightmares in one .
is pitbull our generation 's lou bega ?

documents.title: well , monday was fun
text: we watched a lot of pulse-quickening film trailers .
we listened to new music that 's blowing apart convention .
we 're going to change the world , guys !
sam richards will be with you for more life-changing live pop culture blogging tomorrow .

documents.title: sophie 's lemonade is the most bonkers track we 've heard all year
text: this is what 90s trance-pop sounds like when it 's sucked up through a straw and spat out with a mouthful of popping candy .
it fizzes , it burbles , it plops , and it 's going to make your commute home go a lot quicker .

documents.title: walking dead s5 sneak peek
text: a new trailer for season 5 of the walking dead has landed , and it 's ty understated fare : lots of screaming .
lots of things being pushed through the eye sockets of other things .
lots of andrew lincoln looking very consternated and , inevitably , slightly constipated .
it also looks ace , obviously , though be warned that this trailer is more spoilery than a ford escort spoiler moulded from curdled milk by a mollycoddled child .
yes that makes perfect sense .
be quiet .

documents.title: kevin smith 's new movie is all your nightmares in one
text: hey , so , kevin smith , the guy who helped invent the slacker movie genre with clerks , today released the trailer for his new film , tusk .
it starts off all nicey-nicey and descends into the human centipede crossed with alice in wonderland and has seriously given us the ultimate fear .
do n't watch it if you are averse to walruses , porn-star moustaches or justin long 's crying face .
do watch it if you want to see what haley joel osment looks like as a grown man .

documents.title: jack white watch
text: you just ca n't keep ol ' jack out the news these days , can you ?

from playing what has to be one of the weirdest gigs ever in a medical centre in london to mashing up jay z 's 99 problems , here he is making a surprise appearance with beck and sean lennon over the weekend .
we await his next move .
luke nightingale

documents.title: is pitbull our generation 's lou bega ?
text: if this mambo no 5-alike tune is anything to go by , that 'll be yes .
pitbull ?
lou bega ?
pitbull being pitbull , though , he appears to have taken it one step further by including an indiscreet reference to his jizz .
altogether now : i came , i saw , i conqueredor should i say , i saw , i conquered , i came ?

documents.title: mad max madness
text: seen the new trailer yet ?
it 'll be the biggest film of 2015 for the following reasons : boland/ap 1/ tom hardy being tom hardy .
also , that guttural australian accent as heard at 0m29 is quite something .
demi as g.i .
jane .
/cinetext/hollywood pictures 2/ charlize theron doing a demi moore .
supancic/wireimage 3/ not one but two rockstar spawn riley keough is elvis presley 's granddaughter and zoe kravitz , daughter of lenny ( collection/rex features 4/ mel gibson is nowhere near it .
guichard/sygma/corbis 5/ nor are mullets .
the word 'steampunk ' has been in use in sci-fi circles for more than 30 years .
/nigel roddis 6/ everyone will credit it as the inspiration for next year 's steampunk renaissance .
everyone will start buying bane masks again and go dressed as like this at halloween .
an image from transformers : age of extinction .
/everett/rex features 7/ it makes transformers look like a mess of lame-ass cgi toys .

documents.title: this is my boomstick
text: fans of horror , gore , one-liners and heyooge chins rejoice : sam raimi has confirmed that an evil dead tv show is in the works , written by raimi , his brother ivan and the mighty bruce campbell , star of the original trilogy of films .
this is obviously brilliant news to anyone who is n't an idiot .
to celebrate , here are some of brucey 's best bits .
groovy .

documents.title: azealia banks gets heavy metal and reflective
text: miss banks has left her former label , universal , set up her own , and appears to have been hanging out in cyberdog and listening to korn remixes , if this new , blade runner-sampling tune is anything to go by .
the results are actually great with banks in vampirish monotone mode over an industrial hip-hop beat the sort of thing that would get rinsed at venus x 's ghe20g0th1k club night in nyc .

documents.title: go on , ruin the magic
text: not everyone is happy about the game of thrones blooper reel that premiered at comic-con three days ago .
after all , says the guardian 's resident stuart heritage , stuart heritage , who wants to see king joffrey being all cute ?

documents.title: hunger games : mockingjay trailer
text: i 'm kinda over this already , what with all the teasers of teaser trailers and teasers of teaser promo but here is the first official mockingjay trailer and , nonetheless , it 's got some sterling shows of badassery and some scene-stealing hairdos from julianne moore , natalie dormer and the late philip seymour-hoffman .
feeling : bored .

documents.title: hola !
text: it 's monday and so , in order to try and eliminate other feelings ( tiredness , mild annoyance , that lingering hangover from saturday night ) , i 've decided to take it upon myself to experiment with other emotions on the live blog today .
firstly , confusion .
is this nsfw ?
is it the worst dance music video of the year so far ?
is it an ode to monty python 's every sperm is sacred song ?
is it really , like the press release says , `` uniquely sexy '' ?
i ca n't work it out .

bulletin.text: All the pop culture live blogging you never knew you needed.
The best of today's film trailers, new music, silly photos and telly tidbits, all in one scrollable place.
Coming up: a Mad Max first look, that Game of Thrones blooper reel and Evil Dead's TV show.
